summary: REQ-1 through REQ-4 appear implemented: a new static AMP landing page was added with AMP runtime/boilerplate and canonical link; the canonical `frontend/index.html` now links to the AMP page while preserving the Google verification meta tag; `robots.txt` and `sitemap.xml` were added to allow crawling and include the AMP URL; and the deployment checklist now includes an AMP validation smoke test. However, the diff also includes substantial unrelated frontend/theme/app changes and modifies files that were explicitly constrained as immutable (notably `frontend/src/main.tsx` and `frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts`).

hallucinated_features.description: Substantial redesign/feature work on the non-AMP React marketing site (hero/services/booking form/contact/footer), beyond adding AMP assets and discovery links.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest focuses on static AMP page creation/validation and discovery/crawlability; it does not request rebuilding the React marketing page or booking form implementation details.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (summaries for frontend/src/pages/MarketingPage.tsx, frontend/src/components/BookingForm.tsx, ServicesSection.tsx, ContactSection.tsx, SiteHeader.tsx, SiteFooter.tsx)

hallucinated_features.description: Changes to admin/auth flows and React Query hooks beyond AMP compliance work.
hallucinated_features.reason: Non-goals explicitly exclude creating AMP equivalents for authenticated/admin views, and the request does not ask for changes to admin pages or authentication hooks for the main app.

hallucinated_features.description: Global styling/theme changes (Tailwind config and global CSS palette updates) not required for AMP validation/discovery.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not request a brand/theme overhaul for the canonical app; only AMP/static discovery and crawlability tasks are specified.

hallucinated_features.description: Modification of files explicitly marked immutable by constraints (`frontend/src/main.tsx`, `frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts`).
hallucinated_features.reason: Constraints explicitly forbid modifying these paths; these changes are outside the requested AMP work and violate the stated constraint.

hallucinated_features.description: Addition of an `assetUrl` utility and contact constants module not requested by AMP requirements.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not part of AMP static asset creation, discovery links, robots/sitemap, or deployment checklist update.
